nodes.text: Droogan was a Khramboan vendor on Coruscant.

He swindled C-3PO out of thirty two credits when the droid was shopping for jogan fruit. He first stated it was four credits, then sixteen credits, before finally settling on thirty two. During his haggling, Droogan relayed a supposed saying of his grandfather by telling C-3PO to watch his health, not his credits.
Droogan was voiced by Kevin Michael Richardson. Richardson also voiced Jabba the Hutt in the same episode.
